entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is one of Harry's friends who is put out by the situation.

entities.name: ginny
entities.description: Ginny is Ron's girlfriend who refuses to go with him and instead chooses Neville.

entities.name: neville
entities.description: Neville is a friend of Harry's who Ginny decides to go with to the ball.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is one of Ron's friends who is trying to find someone to go to the ball with.

entities.name: parvati
entities.description: Parvati is a friend of Harry's who he asks to go to the ball with him.

entities.name: lavender
entities.description: Lavender is a friend of Harry's who comes in through the portrait hole.

relationships.description: Ron and Ginny are romantically involved, but Ginny chooses to go with Neville instead.
Harry asks Parvati to go to the ball with him.
